name: Crossfire (new)
description:
A shooter where you can't shoot.

Crossfire is a top-down action arcade shooter where you can't shoot. Instead, you must get one foe to accidentally blast another with their own bullets by staying in the crossfire! Slow down time to weave through bullets and aim your enemies at each other to get kills.

Game Features
  • Modern high-score chasing Action-Arcade all-out neon fever!
  • High-octane and precise action-packed fluid gameplay!
  • Turn the tide of the battle on your foes with powerups! Deflect bullets, smash into enemies, phase through bullets!
  • 3 Different Modes to play the way that's meant for you: Challenge Mode, Campaign Mode, Endless Mode!
  • Rewarded for high-skill-level gameplay with combo systems and score multipliers!
  • Encounter new and different enemies that always introduces something new and exciting to fight against!
